data.eml:eml: A new tetraploid species of Solanum L. sect. Solanum (Solanaceae) from Tanzania

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Manoko, Mkabwa L. K., Weerden, Gerard M. van der, Berg, Ronald G. van den, Mariani, Celestina (2012): A new tetraploid species of Solanum L. sect. Solanum (Solanaceae) from Tanzania. PhytoKeys 16: 65-74, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.16.2884, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.16.2884
